page.title: 08COMMUNICATION.
page.content: A survey of children at Berry Hill Middle School showed that the most common method of communication was by radio,69% people questioned owned one.The television came next with 60%. That surprised us very much because we thought the phone would have been the most important but only 57% had one.37% of those questioned didn't write letters at all,but only 7% wrote a letter more than 6 times a month,probably because we now use the phone more often. British Telecom is the biggest telephone company in Britain.It sells a large number of phones and connects people to the phone system.
